subject: Collaboration Opportunity – Sim Racing Content for Bangladesh
description_text:
Hi SimSonn Team,

I’m Mohammed Muhaiminur Rahman from Bangladesh, and I’m developing a series
of sim racing videos focused on gear, setup guides, and the rapid growth of
competitive sim racing in the region.

Bangladesh is an open, under-served market where most racers still use
basic gear-driven wheels like the Logitech G29, yet many are now upgrading
their setups as direct-drive wheels and stronger bases slowly become more
popular. This makes high-quality pedals, shifters, and handbrakes a prime
upgrade path and SimSonn is already a well-known choice among enthusiasts
looking to step up their hardware.

There’s a strong opportunity for SimSonn to establish a dominant presence
here by showcasing your pedal and peripheral lineup before the market fully
transitions into more advanced sim racing gear.

I’m producing both short-form content for Instagram and YouTube, as well as
a detailed long-form review. Content rollout is planned for late January to
early February after thorough testing and editing. I’m open to reviewing
whichever product you feel best fits your current promotional goals.

If this aligns with your direction, I’m happy to share audience details and
content plans.

Best regards,
Mohammed Muhaiminur Rahman
